verbose_text: A kinetic experiment also indicated that the MDA-MB-231 cells treated with C3 and C5 demonstrated time dependent proteasome inhibition from 2 to 24 h (XREF_FIG and XREF_FIG), which was associated with the accumulation of ubiquitinated proteins, the increased levels of Bax, increased PARP cleavage and increased morphological changes (XREF_FIG; XREF_FIG).
evidence: proteasome inhibition from 2 to 24 h ( XREF_FIG  and  XREF_FIG ), which was associated with the accumulation of ubiquitinated proteins, the increased levels of Bax, increased PARP
